name: churchetto-web
description: Code for the Churchetto web server

scripts.build: browserify -t reactify client/js/app.anonymous.jsx -t envify --NODE_ENV development | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > client/build/bundle.anonymous.js && browserify -t reactify client/js/app.jsx -t envify --NODE_ENV development | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > client/build/bundle.js
scripts.build-anonymous: browserify -t reactify client/js/app.anonymous.jsx -t envify --NODE_ENV development | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > client/build/bundle.anonymous.js
scripts.build-authorized: browserify -t reactify client/js/app.jsx -t envify --NODE_ENV development | uglifyjs --compress --mangle > client/build/bundle.js
